citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 14:00 on
02-Apr-18.
Arrived at facility to find no responsible adult available for inspection after knocking on door and honking the horn.
No answer was received on call to provided number.
